string-array.item: Hoegi Station, Line no.1 (Dark Blue Line) and Jungang Line
Take Shuttle Bus no.1 (goes to Main gate) and Bus No.2 (goes to Back Gate)

University Dormitory (HUFS), Exchange Students are given preference
